methods.name: Balanced
methods.summary: Balanced preset (good default for most images).

methods.name: Stylized
methods.summary: Stylized preset (adds aggressive sampling for QR art).

methods.name: Screen
methods.summary: Screen preset (budgeted decode for UI capture scenarios).

methods.name: WithMaxDimension
methods.summary: Sets maximum dimension (pixels) for QR decoding.

methods.name: WithMaxMilliseconds
methods.summary: Sets the maximum decode time budget.

methods.name: WithBudgetMilliseconds
methods.summary: Sets a hard decode time budget without profile downgrades.

methods.name: WithAutoCrop
methods.summary: Enables or disables auto-crop for QR decoding.

methods.name: WithBudget
methods.summary: Sets the time+dimension budget in one call.

methods.name: WithStylizedSampling
methods.summary: Enables or disables stylized sampling for QR art.

methods.name: WithTileScan
methods.summary: Enables tile-based scanning for multiple QR codes.

properties.name: MaxDimension
properties.summary: Maximum dimension (pixels) for decoding. Larger inputs will be downscaled by sampling. Set to 0 to disable.

properties.name: MaxScale
properties.summary: Maximum scale to try when decoding (1..8). Set to 0 to use profile defaults.

properties.name: MaxMilliseconds
properties.summary: Maximum milliseconds to spend decoding (best effort). Set to 0 to disable.

properties.name: BudgetMilliseconds
properties.summary: Hard budget in milliseconds for decoding (best effort), without profile downgrades. When set, this is used for internal time budgeting instead of MaxMilliseconds.

properties.name: AutoCrop
properties.summary: Attempts to auto-crop likely QR regions before decoding (useful for screenshots).

properties.name: EnableTileScan
properties.summary: Enables tile-based scanning for multiple QR codes in one image.

properties.name: TileGrid
properties.summary: Tile grid size for multi-scan (0 = auto, 2..4 recommended).

properties.name: DisableTransforms
properties.summary: Disable rotation/mirroring attempts even in robust profiles.

properties.name: AggressiveSampling
properties.summary: Enables extra thresholding/sampling passes for stylized or noisy QR codes (slower).

properties.name: StylizedSampling
properties.summary: Enables stylized sampling tuned for QR art (opt-in, slower).
